data.very_long_field_name_that_will_definitel: This is a very long string value that contains a lot of text and will definitely cause line wrapping issues in the terminal display if not handled properly by the text wrapping algorithm

another_field.nested_very_long_field_name_with_lots_of: Another extremely long string value that should demonstrate how the text wrapping works with nested JSON objects and very long field names and values
array_with_long_values: This is the first very long array element that contains a lot of text and should wrap properly
This is the second very long array element with even more text to demonstrate proper wrapping behavior
This is the fourth very long array element that has been designed specifically to test the text wrapping functionality of the JSON diff display module
